es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.net

Class GameServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.bgame.control.Controller
      • es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.net.NetGameController
        • es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.net.GameServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObserver

    public class GameServer
extends NetGameController
implements GameObserver
    The class GameServer gives a server for a board game. This server accepts clients until every piece in the game is taken by one of them. Rejects any other client until the game stops.
    Author:
    David Fdez Alcoba, Manuel Sanchez Torron

      Represents a client listener.

        private boolean firstTime
        Tells the server if it is the first time being played. If it is, the game initializes a new game, otherwise it calls the restart controller method.

    • Method Detail

      • quitPressed

        public void quitPressed()
        Stops the server and the game if it is still in play and disconnects every client. Closes the server.

      • forwardNotification

        private void forwardNotification(Response r)
        This method is used for notifying the clients of the changes in the game or the chat messages someone sends.
        Parameters:
        r -

      • startServer

        private void startServer()
        Starts the server in the given port and waits for incoming connections

      • handleRequest

        private void handleRequest(java.net.Socket s)
        Handles an incoming connection request as follows. Accepts the client if there are available pieces and sends it the gamefactory and its correspondent piece. If there are enough players to start the game it starts it and rejects every other request until the game is stopped, ended.
        Parameters:
        s -

      • startClientListener

        private void startClientListener(Connection c)
        Starts the client listener.
        Parameters:
        c - The connection to the client

      • onGameStart

        public void onGameStart(Board board,
               java.lang.String gameDesc,
               java.util.List<Piece> pieces,
               Piece turn)
        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies that a game has started.

        Notifica que se ha iniciado un juego.

        Specified by:
        onGameStart in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        board - The current (typically read only) board. El tablero actual (de solo lectura).
        gameDesc - A string describing the currently played game.

        Un string que describe el juego al que se esta jugando.

        pieces - A list of pieces that are used to play the game (each piece belongs to a player).

        Lista de fichas que se utilizan para jugar a este juego (cada ficha pertenece a un jugador).

        turn - The piece to be played next.

        Ficha a la que corresponde mover.

      • onGameOver

        public void onGameOver(Board board,
              Game.State state,
              Piece winner)
        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies that a game has finished (with a winner, draw, or stopped).

        Notifica que ha terminado un juego (con un ganador, en tablas, o se ha interrumpido).

        Specified by:
        onGameOver in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        board - The current (typically read only) board. El tablero actual (de solo lectura).
        state - The state in which the game has finished.

        Estado en el que ha quedado el tablero.

        winner - The piece of the winner, if the game has finished with a winner, otherwise null.

        Ficha del ganador si el juego ha terminado con un ganador, o null en caso contrario.

      • onMoveEnd

        public void onMoveEnd(Board board,
             Piece turn,
             boolean success)
        Description copied from interface: GameObserver
        Notifies that the execution of a move has finished.

        Notifica que ha terminado la realización de un movimiento.

        Specified by:
        onMoveEnd in interface GameObserver
        Parameters:
        board - The current (typically read only) board. El tablero actual (de solo lectura).
        turn - The piece that was supposed to be played by the move.

        Ficha a la que correspondia mover en el movimiento que acaba de terminar.

        success - true if the move has been executed successfully, otherwise false.

        true si el movimiento se ha realizado correctamente, false en caso contrario.
